projects.name: Gist: Sentiment analysis classifier
projects.description: 2024: This code uses a corpus generated by Amazon that collects reviews of sections such as books, DVDs or electronics. From this data, the most relevant words for each class were extracted and coded to use sklearn classification models.

projects.name: Gist: SPAM Classifier
projects.description: 2024: Code that uses a corpus with mails classified as HAM and SPAM. These mails are processed to obtain useful bigraphs to help determine their label.

projects.name: Development of a model to predict water turbidity through image processing
projects.description: 2023: The model is built using data from different water turbidity levels. Projective integrals are used to profile each image and it is tested with different sklearn and keras models in order to improve its performance.

projects.name: Frontend workflow with Node.js and React
projects.description: 2023: This is my first frontend framework designed to manage the data obtained from the backend. It allows to display them, perform queries, send data, visualize and update the information efficiently.

projects.name: Backend workflow with express and React
projects.description: 2023: This is my first workflow with Express to query a database and manage data, allowing to get, modify, delete or update data.

projects.name: Deaf-mute alphabet prediction model using images
projects.description: 2022: You will find all the programming to program your own model for classification, train it and run it.
